messages.title: BACK ME WITH YOUR LOCAL VOTE AND I WILL:
messages.content: Provide strong and stable leadership for our country, Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future, Always stand up for you and your family

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future
Provide strong and stable leadership for our country

mentions.tacticalSituation: Don't risk our future at this crucial moment in history with a vote for any other party in Southampton Test.

endorsements.endorsement: Back Theresa May to secure a Brexit deal that delivers for you and your family.
